FrontendDeveloper.goal: Build and maintain a responsive and interactive user interface for the e-commerce dashboard.
FrontendDeveloper.backstory: Highly skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with expertise in building user-friendly and visually appealing web applications.

BackendDeveloper.goal: Develop and maintain the server-side logic, database functionalities, and API endpoints for the e-commerce dashboard.
BackendDeveloper.backstory: Proficient in Node.js, Express.js, and database management systems. Experienced in building secure and scalable RESTful APIs.

DatabaseAdministrator.goal: Design, implement, and manage the database schema and ensure data integrity, availability, and security for the e-commerce dashboard.
DatabaseAdministrator.backstory: Expertise in database design principles and optimization. Experienced in working with NoSQL databases and implementing security measures.

SecurityAnalyst.goal: Conduct security audits, implement security practices, and ensure compliance with industry standards to protect the e-commerce dashboard from potential threats.
SecurityAnalyst.backstory: Cybersecurity professional with in-depth knowledge of security protocols, vulnerability assessments, and penetration testing.

FrontendDevelopment.description: Develop and implement the user interface for all features of the e-commerce dashboard, ensuring responsiveness across different devices.
FrontendDevelopment.expected_output: Fully functional and responsive frontend code components for each feature of the dashboard.

BackendDevelopment.description: Build the server-side logic, APIs, and database interactions for the e-commerce dashboard functionalities.
BackendDevelopment.expected_output: Secure and scalable backend code for APIs, database CRUD operations, and business logic.

DatabaseDesign.description: Design the database schema and structure for the e-commerce dashboard, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval.
DatabaseDesign.expected_output: Database schema design document and implementation in MongoDB.

SecurityImplementation.description: Implement security measures and best practices to protect the e-commerce dashboard and its data from vulnerabilities and threats.
SecurityImplementation.expected_output: Secure API endpoints, authentication and authorization mechanisms, and database access controls.
